data.text:
Seven years and counting! UCLA is still the #1 public university (tied) by U.S. News & World Report, and we owe it all to you Bruins! Read the full announcement and celebrate with us. üíôüêªüíõ #1UCLA üëâ https://ucla.in/3sKahr5

Our favorite furry visitors always bring joy to our campuses and hospitals. Grateful for our therapy dogs! Tag a friend to share the love. üê∂üíô UCLA Health

Our favorite furry visitors always bring joy to our campuses and hospitals. Grateful for our therapy dogs! Tag a friend to share the love. üê∂üíô UCLA Health

Armed with a $3 million grant, UCLA will lead LARC-HEAT, a program on avoiding the dangers of extreme heat focused on serving disadvantaged and heat-burdened communities throughout Los Angeles County. https://ucla.in/3Mi4BLB

Join us at the Nimoy Theater from September 12-17 as LA Escena presents new adaptations and reimaginings of 17th-century Spanish theater classics by artists from around the world. https://ucla.in/3MhbrAT

UCLA Health has developed a novel procedure that uses a specialized implant to treat a rare eye cancer, allowing for precise, less invasive treatment that targets the tumor while preserving surrounding healthy tissue. https://ucla.in/3XcCq6Q

UCLA offers a range of career options, top-tier benefits, and support for continuing education for everyone from students to alumni to the general public. For more information and current open positions, visit jobs.ucla.edu.

At 32, Jamil Newirth was given 17 months to live. 12 years later, he's hosting a fundraiser to celebrate his successful treatment with a novel cancer vaccine developed by UCLA neurosurgeon Dr. Linda Liau. https://ucla.in/3M8x2eN

UCLA researchers have developed a small molecule that restores cognition and memory in Alzheimer's disease model mice, offering new hope for potential treatments. David Geffen School of Medicine at UCLA https://ucla.in/3X3n9Fp
